strong.span:
Pre K and Kinder
Enrollment Packets

br.br:
We will be collecting enrollment packets
for the 2020-2021 PreK and
Kindergarten students on
Thursday, April 30th
from 1:00-3:00
in the elementary. Please
make sure you bring the student's
birth certificate,
shot records, and
2 proofs of residence
along with the
completed enrollment packet.
Starting 3/23/20 - 5/21/20
Texico Schools will be providing
Grab & Go
Breakfast & Lunch Meals
Monday - Thursday
from 9:00 - 10:30 AM
Meals can be picked up at
Lion Park 200 Garwood or
The Fire Department Station #2
on Avenue F
Texico, NM
Texico Schools will be delivering
Breakfast & Lunch Meals
to the homes of the
Bus Route Students
that do not live in Texico
------------------------------------

strong.em:
It is the policy of the Texico Public Schools not to discriminate on the basis of race, sex, religion, national origin, or handicap in any of its educational programs or employment practices. Inquiries regarding compliance with Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, Title IX of the Educational Amendments of 1972, or Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 may be directed to the Superintendent at
520 N. Griffin St., Texico, NM 88135
Title IX coordinator, Ryan Autrey, phone number 575-482-3305 or rautrey@texicoschools.com
Texico Municipal Schools Bullying and Harrassment Policy

div.div: 520 N. Griffin St. - P.O. Box 237, Texico, NM 88135 | Phone 575-482-3801 | Fax 575-482-3650
